name: org.hello.coolapk

releases.name: Release-1.14
releases.description:
1. 若头条banner有“今日酷安”且包含广告，可以保留“今日酷安”
2. 316卡片不再固定位置
* 模块开始检测酷安版本，若版本低于12.0.0，酷安启用模块将闪退
releases.descriptionHTML:
1. 若头条banner有“今日酷安”且包含广告，可以保留“今日酷安”
  2. 316卡片不再固定位置
  • 模块开始检测酷安版本，若版本低于12.0.0，酷安启用模块将闪退

releases.name: Release-1.13
releases.description:
1. 禁用Bugly/Umeng
2. 去除搜索框热词
3. 自定义动态内容黑名单(正则表达式匹配)
releases.descriptionHTML:
1. 禁用Bugly/Umeng
  2. 去除搜索框热词
  3. 自定义动态内容黑名单(正则表达式匹配)

releases.name: Release-1.12
releases.description:
1. 修复闪退
2. 移除酷安链接追踪
releases.descriptionHTML:
1. 修复闪退
  2. 移除酷安链接追踪

releases.name: Release-1.10
releases.description:
1. 屏蔽酷安更新弹窗
2. 修改ad过滤规则

推荐使用版本：v12+
releases.descriptionHTML:
1. 屏蔽酷安更新弹窗
  2. 修改ad过滤规则

推荐使用版本：v12+

releases.name: Release-1.06
releases.description: 1. You can change the mode of Coolapk now.
releases.descriptionHTML: 1. You can change the mode of Coolapk now.

releases.name: Release-1.05
releases.description: 1. You can remove items in search activity.
releases.descriptionHTML: 1. You can remove items in search activity.

releases.name: Release-1.04
releases.description: 1. You can Remove the bottom navigation as you want now.
releases.descriptionHTML: 1. You can Remove the bottom navigation as you want now.

releases.name: Release-1.03
releases.description: fix a bug when opening the settings dialog
releases.descriptionHTML: fix a bug when opening the settings dialog

releases.name: Release-1.02
releases.description: You can open the settings UI in the settings activity of Coolapk now.
releases.descriptionHTML: You can open the settings UI in the settings activity of Coolapk now.

readme:
# FuckCoolapk R

[Best present for 316 and 423.](https://github.com/ejiaogl/FuckCoolapk/wiki/Background-information)

## Features

- Remove ads from feed
- Remove tracking parameters when sharing
- Remove "Mentioned Goods" in post
- Remove items in search activity
- Check post status
- Custom navigation bar
- ......

## Requirements

- Lastest LSPosed
- Lastest official version (if still under maintenance)

## Misc

- Module setting panel is in the setting activity.
- Some features may not work in some versions, so test it by yourself.
- Don't forget to hide this module by your smart brain, or your account may be banned. 👀

## Communication

- [Telegram channel](https://t.me/fuck_coolapk)
- [Telegram group](https://t.me/fuck_coolapk_chat)

## Contribution

Currently we adopt an invitation policy, if you are interested in development, please email to fuckcoolapk@pm.me.
